name: Kittenstein 3D
description:
Done in 72 hours for Mini Jam 80: Cats.

The Mastermind Evil Overlord Villain (...let's just call him M.E.O.W.) is back and angrier than ever! After failing to conquer the world or whatever, M.E.O.W. was sent to an animal shelter and eventually adopted. This time, instead of jumping straight to world domination, he plans to reach his goal with smaller steps..

Controls:
WASD to move
Mouse to look around
Left click to shoot furball
Right click to melee

Tips:
Furballs stop roombas
Use your melee attack to destroy items and stop the human temporarily
It takes a few hits to destroy stuff
Everything that is green is destructible
You can only destroy 2D objects
Once you destroy enough stuff, use the front door to escape!

Credits: 
Programming by toyboat#5673
Music & SFX by Abieo#1413
Art & Animations by doodlenstein#6185
Game & Level Design by LeDankWolffe#3381
